com.myronmarston.music.settings
Class TimeSignature

java.lang.Object
  com.myronmarston.music.notation.AbstractNotationElement
      com.myronmarston.music.settings.TimeSignature
All Implemented Interfaces:
NotationElement
public class TimeSignature
extends AbstractNotationElement

Class that holds the time signature for the fractal piece. A time signature is defined by a numerator and a denominator. Both values must be positive and the denominator must be a power of 2 (i.e., 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, etc).

Field Detail

DEFAULT

public static final TimeSignature DEFAULT
The time signature that should be used if the user does not specify one--common time, i.e. 4/4.
